GK19jivskd_u:1546: iti bahu-vidha-khelayā rajanyāḥ praśamam iva pratipadya nāgarendraḥ |
GK19jivskd_u:1551: atha phalaniṣpattiḥ ghoṣe sva-prema-koṣe pitṛ-mukha-sukhada-svīya-vṛndena dīvyan kaṃsena preṣitebhyas tam atibhayamayaṃ vīkṣya nighnan muhus tān |
GK19jivskd_u:1552: hanti1 teṣām apaśyann adhi madhu-puri taṃ hantum añcan sa-vṛndam
GK19jivskd_u:1553: hatvā tam ghoṣam āgāt tad-atula-sukha-kṛd yaḥ sadā tam bhajāmi ||1||
GK19jivskd_u:1554: rādhādyāḥ kṛṣṇa-kāntāḥ svayam avataraṇaṃ kṛṣṇavat prāpya līlā-
GK19jivskd_u:1555: śaktyā vismṛtya nityāṃ sthitim aparatayā jñāta-kṛṣṇās tathāpi |
GK19jivskd_u:1557: spaṣṭaṃ jagmuḥ sva-kāntaṃ tam ati-sukha-sudhā-sindhu-magnāntarāḥ smaḥ
GK19jivskd_u:1559: hatvā tat-kliṣṭa-cittāṃ pitṛ-mukha-janatāṃ nirvṛtāṃ suṣṭhu cakre |
GK19jivskd_u:1560: kiṃ cānyaḥ sva-priyāṇāṃ patir iti bahir akhyāti3-duḥkhāni hṛtvā
GK19jivskd_u:1564: sandhyāyāṃ gopa-gopī-sukhada-gṛha-gatiḥ sānurāgaṃ kṣapāyām tat-tad-dīvyad-vihāraḥ sphuratu tava manaḥ sarvadā kṛṣṇa-candraḥ ||4||
GK19jivskd_u:1566: prāyaṃ tanvan sabhāyāṃ rahasi tu dayitā pūrva-rāgādy-udantam |
GK19jivskd_u:1567: vargaṃ tat-tan-nisargaṃ nijam anu vijayī sarva-sāt-parva kurvan
GK19jivskd_u:1572: naktaṃ rāsādi-līlā-lalitatama-gatiḥ sarvadā syād gatir naḥ ||6||
GK19jivskd_u:1573: śrīmad-vṛndāvanendo madhupa-khaga-mṛgāḥ śreṇi-lokā dvijātā dāsā lālyāḥ surabhyaḥ sahacara-halabhṛt-tāta-mātr-ādi-vargāḥ
GK19jivskd_u:1574: preyasyas tāsu rādhā-pramukha-vara-dṛśāś ceti vṛndaṃ yathordhvaṃ
GK19jivskd_u:1575: tad-rūpāloka-tṛṣṇak pramadam anudinaṃ hanta paśyāma karhi ||7||

GK19jivskd_u:1576_1: cāyati prājyāntargatam ātta-narmas tu sakhī-madhya-sthitaṃ paśyati |
GK19jivskd_u:1577: rādhā-mādhava-nāma-dheya-mithunaṃ vighnān atītyāmitān dāmpatye sthitam atra vā yadi rahaḥ prāptaṃ tadā kiṃ punaḥ? ||8||
GK19jivskd_u:1580: vaktraṃ paśyati mārṣṭi locana-puṭaṃ nāsāgram uddaṇḍayan niṃste gaṇḍa-yugaṃ hṛdā hṛdi milal lelīyate śarmaṇi1 ||9||
GK19jivskd_u:1587: pūrṇāḥ pulindya iti1 yā stutā vraja-ramādibhiḥ2 |
GK19jivskd_u:1588: na vayaṃ sādhvi sāmreti3 śreṇibhir dvārikā-śriyām ||1 ||
GK19jivskd_u:1589: anayārārādhito nūnam4 itthaṃ pūrvābhir eva ca |
GK19jivskd_u:1591: rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane |5 iti.
GK19jivskd_u:1592: tasyāḥ kāntaḥ sadā kāntaḥ sa syād ekānta-bhāg vaśaḥ ||3||

GK19jivskd_u:1595: svaṃ dāsyaṃ diśad asti yat prabhu-yugaṃ tan me sadāstāṃ gatiḥ ||
GK19jivskd_u:1596: gaṅgāyāṃ kakucaṅgamuk śruti-madāj jāgrad-gataṃ māṃ prati śrī-vṛndā-vipine trayīm api parāṃ svapnād avasthaṃ punaḥ |
GK19jivskd_u:1597: yaḥ śrīmān madhumardanaḥ subhagatā sad-rūpatā viśrutaḥ saṃjñāvān laghu-vaṃśa-śaṃsakatayā vande ca vande ca tam ||6||
